bibl.title: The Archive of Aurelius Sakaon: Papers of an Egyptian Farmer in the last Century of Theadelphia
bibl.seg: Parássoglou George M. (collected and re-edited by), The Archive of Aurelius Sakaon. Papers of an Egyptian Farmer in the Last Century of Theadelphia. (Papyrologische Texte und Abhandlungen. 23.)
Bonn, R. Habelt, 1978, 4°, xx-263 pp. et 15 pll.

C.R. par J. Bingen, ChrEg 54 (1979) No. 107, pp. 167-168. - R. Coles, Ellenika 31 (1979) pp. 517-519. - M. Drew-Bear, BibO 39 (1982) coll. 567-569. - R.P. Duncan-Jones, JHS 101 (1981) pp. 203-204. - G. Mussies, Mnemosyne 4e s., 36 (1983) pp. 454-457. - Georges Nachtergael, AntCl 52 (1983) pp. 446-447. - J. O'Callaghan, StPap 10 (1981) pp. 132-133. - Peter J. Parsons, JEA 71 (1985) pp. 209-210. - J. Schwartz, REA 83 (1981) p. 125. - J.D. Thomas, Gnomon 53 (1981) pp. 805-807.
